mapper.sql: id, mine_name, description, frame_num, is_delete, update_time, create_time, tenant_id
mapper.insert: insert into mine_setting (mine_name, description, frame_num, is_delete, update_time, create_time, tenant_id) values (#{mineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into mine_setting
mine_name,
description,
frame_num,
is_delete,
update_time,
create_time,
tenant_id,

mapper.update:
update mine_setting
mine_name = #{mineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
frame_num = #{frameNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mine_setting set mine_name = #{mineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_num = #{frameNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update mine_setting set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from mine_setting
is_delete = 0
AND (mine_name like #{keyWord} or `description` like #{keyWord})

select mine_name FROM mine_setting where is_delete=0
AND id!=#{id}
select id FROM mine_setting where is_delete=0
